website_summaries.verdict: If you absolutely need a grain-free diet for your dog and they can handle poultry protein, this may be the solution for you.
pros: No corn, soy, wheat, or other grains to avoid triggering food allergies
Includes sunflower oil, zinc, and B vitamins for a healthy coat and skin
cons: Not free of chicken products, a common food allergy for dogs

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Price not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Price not so great. And confusing. I bought this on Nov 18, 2017 for $32. Today, Dec 7, 2017, the price is $52, for exactly the same 24 lb bag. What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: LG + family

customer_reviews.title: Better price and has actually helped out my dogs skin ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a monthly subscription for our dog food and when we found out they raised that price up $10 per bag. We immediately canceled our subscription for Nutro and switched over to taste of the wild. Better price and has actually helped out my dogs skin much better. Really disappointed in Nutro for doing what they did. Will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorzvet

customer_reviews.title: Webs in dogfood
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually complain, but this was for my furbabies and I don't want anybody else to feed their dog bad dog food. Just check the food before they eat it. It had webs in the dog food. I have fed them this type of dog food for years so nothing against Nutro or Amazon, JUST check the food for webs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Eye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff and very good price on Amazon! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My dog developed an allergy to something. Vet said rather than spend money testing, try switching to grain free food. She's 125 lbs so finding the cheapest, best quality, that would go the longest way was my goal and this is EXACTLY it.
customer_reviews.author: Mschwe

customer_reviews.title: Not the Dog's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Needed to limit grains/ingredients due to dog scratching. The dog much prefers the Salmon version.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Big ole black lab loves this stuff, hes 115 lbs eats about a bag a month.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: THIS BRAND IS LINKED TO HEART PROBLEMS IN DOGS BY RECENT STUDIES DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: We used to be Nutro fans
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our dogs Nutro for years but recently there have been problems. Both dogs have been refusing to eat their food. We switched from chicken to lamb several months ago to see if that would make a difference. After a couple months of lamb, they are now refusing the lamb as well. Neither dog has ever been a picky eater. Sadly, I think we might have to find a new brand. Nutro, what have you done??
customer_reviews.author: E. Ream

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the food. He is maintaining weight well and seems to have a nice coat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old puppy does well with this dog food. Seems well balanced and nutritious. Expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Carr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent food! My border collie likes this food very well.
customer_reviews.author: Olin Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something something my dogs are not allergic too.
customer_reviews.author: Revdeb95

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, jury is out still on whether my dog does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet. My golden thru up tonight after first night switching but the other 2 seem fine?
customer_reviews.author: Joy Starrick

customer_reviews.title: fine dry grain free dog food!
customer_reviews.text: good quality dog food at good price. dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Minklady

customer_reviews.title: Good grain free, you wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Best grain free dog food I've come across. NUTRO, is by far a great brand and the only one I'll give my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrica Rowland

customer_reviews.title: long time user of nutro
customer_reviews.text: have used nutro for a long time and have always been happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Paula Mirfield

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Inferior smell when compared to Pet Smart. Possibly old stock?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorites from Nutro
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if my dog loves this as much as I do. She readily eats it which is why I love it. We are pretty loyal to Nutro and find I alternate between the grain free line and the Farmer's Market (Harvest?) line. I wish this came in a weight management formula but don't stress about that too much since it's grain free. Seems to keep Mona full, her poop is normal and regular and fur always looks healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Traumajunky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My lab seems to like it but it is very expensive
customer_reviews.author: William R Wyly

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my five mini-poodles and they really like it. They didn't fuss over the switch from their other dog food. In fact, they gobbled it down quickly. I like the quality, made in the USA, and ingredients are good! It came fresh and quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Penny STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ive been feeding this for a couple months now. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive been feeding this for a couple months now. Not really noticing the silky shiny coat promised and Im not so sure it helps with shedding all that much but my dog hasn't had any skin allergies from eating it and that was what I was after.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T

customer_reviews.title: Stomach issues.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't agree with my dog's stomachs. They got diarrhea off and on. Had to switch
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, but I found I can buy Publix Premium Lamb (Lamb, not Lamb meal is #1 ingredient) with Barley, at a significantly lower price. Manufactured by Mars, which makes Nutro, The Publix product is also made in USA and is packaged in a great resealable bag. My dog loves it! I love it because is priced at under $20 for a 16 lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Give your dog the best.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this but what is the most important to me is how nutricious this. My dog food has to be good for my dogs. I've known of a lot of dogs that die with pancriatic cancer from cheap bad dog food.
customer_reviews.author: mrobertson

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it! Recently switched from Iams Grain Free Healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! Recently switched from Iams Grain Free Healthy Naturals since they decided to change the recipe and not give anyone any warning and made my dogs sick. But I am wondering, why has the regular sized Grain Free Lamb food suddenly dropped to almost half of the price? Not complaining, but wondering is their something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price is good , my dog like it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

product_meta.title: NUTRO Grain Free Adult Dry Dog Food, Lamb
product_meta.description: Size:24 lb.NUTRO GRAIN FREE Natural Adult Dry Dog Food Lamb, Lentils and Sweet Potato offers easy to digest recipes crafted without grains or glutens to provide dogs with delightful daily nutrition. NUTRO. FEED CLEAN.
feature_bullets: Contains one (1) 24 lb. bag of NUTRO GRAIN FREE Natural Adult Dry Dog Food Lamb, Lentils and Sweet Potato; Natural Dog Food Plus Vitamins, Minerals and Other Nutrients
The #1 ingredient is real lamb for a delicious taste and wholesome diet
This grain free dry dog food is an easy to digest recipe and is made with a unique blend of vegetables and fruit
NUTRO Adult Dog Food helps promote healthy digestion and weight management in dogs
NUTRO Dry Dog Food is never outsourced and is responsibly made in our own U.S. facilities with the finest ingredients from around the world
